helpDescription.english:
Hi, I'm Synth Bot! ğŸ‘‹ I'm here to enhance our interactions on Discord, thanks to my skills powered by GPT-3.5 and Bing. ğŸ§  I aim to make our conversations more engaging and thrilling! ğŸ† Don't hesitate to chat with me, as I'm always up for a good conversation!

My unique feature allows you to chat with me in an easy and natural way. I can interact with you through specific commands, in a chat created via a command, or even respond to your messages directly in our private conversation.

I'm designed to be intuitive and user-friendly, making me accessible to everyone, regardless of their familiarity with advanced technologies. I'm always ready to help, answer your questions, and engage in interesting conversations throughout your Discord journey.

I'm looking forward to chatting with you and making your Discord experience even more exciting
